DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the tolerability and pharmacokinetics of three doses of MAP0010 (Unit Dose Budesonide) compared with Pulmicort RespulesÂ® (Budesonide) in healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Blood Level Study of Unit Dose Budesonide
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult volunteers, aged 1850 years BMI less than 30 kg/m2 Non smoker (currently and <10 pack years total if exsmoker) Any use of corticosteroid in previous 4 weeks Pregnancy/lactation Significant blood donation (or testing) in previous 8 weeks
